title: Ombrulla
description: Ombrulla is an AI-driven company providing specialized services like AI Visual Inspection, AI People Tracking, AI Defect Detection, AI Infrastructure Inspection, and AI Data Analytics. Our tailored solutions empower businesses with data-driven decisions, automation, and improved bottom lines. PETRAN, our cutting-edge tracking solution, utilizes AI and IoT to monitor assets, machinery, equipment, people, and facilities, enabling comprehensive performance management and environmental sustainability.

locations.street: Third Floor TI, HSR Layout, Bangalore, Karnataka, 560102
